vecUnachieved.strDescription: Go faster than 60 km/h with your machine
Subscribe and download someone else's machine
Complete Standing Stone without using armor
Complete a campaign level under 2 seconds
Beat Queens Fodder without using fire or explosives

vecUnachieved.strName: It was hot, now it's not
vecUnachieved.strDescription: Put out a burning block using water
Beat Scouts of Tolbrynd without cannons, flamethrowers or crossbows
Steal the Duke's knowledge before someone notices!

data.strFullDescription:
[img]https://media.st.dl.bscstorage.net/steam/apps/346010/extras/Besiege_MainGif.gif?t=1562671753[/img]
Besiege 是一款以物理学为基础的建造游戏。您可以在游戏里建造中世纪的攻城机械，将巨型堡垒及宁静村落夷为废墟。 建造一台大型机械来粉碎架架风车，剿灭勇武士兵，运送宝贵资源，抵御孤注一掷的敌人的弓箭利炮以及所能调动的其他一切力量，来保护您的心血之作。 创造一个轰隆前行的庞然大物，或是翱翔蓝天，攻城掠地，大开杀戒。 最后，您必须用最具创造力、最冷酷无情的方式，摧毁城堡，杀他个片甲不留，征服每个王国！
data.strSnippet: Besiege 是一款以物理学为基础的建造游戏。您可以在游戏里建造中世纪的攻城机械，将巨型堡垒及宁静村落夷为废墟。 建造一台大型机械来粉碎架架风车，剿灭勇武士兵，运送宝贵资源，抵御孤注一掷的敌人的弓箭利炮以及所能调动的其他一切力量，来保护您的心血之作。 创造一个轰隆前行的庞然大物，或是翱翔蓝天，攻城掠地，大开杀戒。

data.title: Thomas-Mech (Vanilla)

data.title: Mammoth
data.short_description: Mammoth 7.0 Function key settings : move : turn : activate main cannon : launch main cannon : launch rockets : angle control for rockets and head : launch tusk rockets : toggle water evacuation : detach needle spine : jump?

data.title: Strigon Interceptor [block 2]

data.title: Moon Base Road
data.short_description: This is a simple Starcraft themed race track. It's kinda object heavy because making a smooth road with it's white lines cost a lot of blocks.

data.title: K2 MBT
data.short_description: K2 MBT 2.2 The K2 Black Panther is newest main battle tank of South Korea. Function key settings : move : turn : rotate turret : angle control for cannon : launch main cannon : launch machine gun : toggle view for turrets

data.title: Y-Uranium
data.short_description: I got carried away a little bit with this one and it ended up being a bit too high in the block count (260) but still a nice Y quad. Controls: - WASD (TFGH): pitch and roll - Q (R): main thrusters - shift (X): turbo - Arrow keys: Yaw, ascend and descend

data.title: Dreadnought Mk.II (Warhammer 40k)

data.title: Terror Worm

data.title: SR-71 Blackbird
data.short_description: Update! A few changes: made it better and changed the picture. The SR-71 BlackBird is here! And it glides so well, that if you don't use the brake. You might not be able to stop it ... Seriously, it really glides. Controls left shift-engines-I recommend us
